Quick Security Tips
  • Keep your device updated: Always install the latest OS and app updates.
  • Use official app stores: Download apps only from Google Play.
  • Check app permissions: Review what each app can access on your device.
  • Use a screen lock: Secure your device with a PIN, password, or biometric lock.
  • Be careful on public Wi-Fi: Avoid accessing sensitive information on public networks.
  • Enable remote wipe: Set up "Find My Device" to remotely erase your data if your phone is lost.
